resources.string:
This app is still in the dev stages so here's a few tips to get you started: 

Using a 'Recursive delete' will delete a folder's contents AND ALL sub-folders's files too.
Uncheck this option to only delete files directly within the target folder. 
Optional deletion or not the sub-folders themselves with 'Delete Folders'. 

Using a 'Strict interval' means that the folder will be cleared exactly when you set it for.
This possible advantage has the disadvantage of using up some small amount of extra battery in some situations.
If this is an issue for you disable this option. 

If you ONLY want to manualy clear a folder:
- set the target folder
- hit the 'ClearMeOut Now' button when desired

As long as a folder is set the 'ClearMeOut Now' button will work and respect all deletion settings.
